display.title: §7Meka§r-Logistics Incorporated
display.description: Take advantage of mekanism's cables/pipes/tubes/transporters to move energy/fluids/gases/items respectively. Did you know that if you were to take an alloy and right click the previous tier of that said alloy the cables/pipes/tubes/transporters will upgrade to the alloy's tier (basic + enriched alloy = advanced) this will be wasteful and if you only have 1 it will still use 1 full, also it doesn't cares if you don't right click on a lower tier if it can find somewhere where it can upgrade it will upgrade.
